code: @Override public void configure() throws Exception {     // rest-dsl is also configured in the application.properties file     rest("/geocoder").description("Geocoder REST service").consumes("application/json").produces("application/json").get().description("Geocoder address lookup").outType(GeocodingResult[].class).param().name("address").type(query).description("The address to lookup").dataType("string").endParam().responseMessage().code(200).message("Geocoder successful").endResponseMessage().toD("geocoder:address:${header.address})"). }
